name: Don't Get Fired (folayfila)
description:
You are late for work again, your boss is mad, there are  tons of paper work to be finished, people are running everywhere, getting fired left and right.

You have to survive the chaos without getting fired.

How to play:

w-a-s-d : Pickup and finish paper work by following the arrows around the map.

- You can carry up to 3 papers simultaneously.

v : switch view.

- Avoid small talks and your Boss.

- Finish the paper work before your time runs out.

good luck :)
